phrases.phrase: 재주는 곰이 넘고 돈은 주인이 받는다
meanings: A bear does a handspring and its owner takes the money, One beats the bush and another catches the birds

examples.korean: Drawing and singing were among her many accomplishments. 발음듣기 그림과 노래도 그녀가 지닌 많은 재주에 속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Drawing and singing were among her many accomplishments. 발음

examples.korean: a poet of rare accomplishment 발음듣기 드문 재주를 지닌 시인 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a poet of rare accomplishment 발음

examples.korean: He is a great talent. 발음듣기 그는 재주[재능]가 뛰어난 사람이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He is a great talent. 발음

examples.korean: He’s got a real knack for making money. 발음듣기 그는 정말 돈 버는 데 재주가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s got a real knack for making money. 발음

examples.korean: That was no mean feat. 발음듣기 그것은 하찮은 재주가 아니었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That was no mean feat. 발음
